text: In Apache 2.4.x there is a directive CacheQuickHandler that will allow other modules to process even though mod_cache is enabled. However there is no such directive in Apache 2.2.x. We have several Apache instances in the deployment with a mix of 2.2.x and 2.4.x where WebGates has been setup.  The desired behavior is that Webgate should still be able to control the authentication and authorization flow when mod_cache is enabled, to process every request so that we can ensure proper authentication and authorization on the requested resource.
creator: mahenkri@cisco.com
